content.rendered:
This soothing delicious rose scented moisturiser sinks instantly into skin to soften and nourish, and deeply hydrate.

A blend of exquisite healing botanical oils camellia, rosewood, calendula and neroli, it quickly reduces redness and irritation leaving skin remarkably supple and soft.

Naturally packed with vitamins and antioxidants, it dramatically improves skin tone it while strengthening and protecting against future damage.

excerpt.rendered: A delicious rose scented daily moisturiser to deeply nourish, heal and hydrate sensitive or irritated skin.
